attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8R8enCYcAsYay75O_description
attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVR-FFJS1Pu4TNYi-n-_description
attribs.current: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LW9Nypl-sGUenlYnZql_description
attribs.current: At first level, on your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LW9P9ZJkygAxAXNqVET_description
attribs.current: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LW9PSsdtScOTjOTZh9X_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LWIW4bbRBmfJALxdaLP_description
attribs.current: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LWIWR2miErK-zTv2lw4_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LWIXRwTqoyL8Pwoh04U_description
attribs.current: You have inherited the innate spellcasting ability of your ancestors. This ability allows you to cast Nondetection on yourself at will, without needing a material component. You can also cast each of the following spells once with this ability: Blindness/Deafness, Blur, and Disguise Self. You regain the ability to cast these spells when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells, and you cast them at their lowest possible levels.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: 5 People: I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a tripdown the Styx for all I care. (Neutral)

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: 1 I'm trying to pay off a debt to a generous benefactor.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: 5 I turn tail and run when things look bad.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
4 Fence
8 I blow up at the slightest insult.
3 The first thing I do in a new place is note the locationsof everything valuable- or where such things could be hidden.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LWZ26mSXaMP04o9Eo84_itemcontent
attribs.current: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LWZDxyzBUkcdocjBX2R_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LWZKGoIhJJYW4O0ZuWf_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LWtyswtvSE2UF-QNCRy_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current: Dubabob had the unfortunate fate of being ugly. Even for a Deep Gnome, his face looked more goblin than anything else. He was constantly teased by other people, and even his fellow gnomes, and was given the nickname "Goblin Face" by everyone who knew him. No matter how hard he tried, the relentless torture of his peers continued to beat him down throughout his life and gave him a remarkably short temper when it comes to his appearance. Still, Dubabob tried to own up to his ugliness and gladly calls himself Goblin Face hoping one day that name will be remembered for generations. Dubabob gravitated towards crime, as criminals didn't seem to care about his appearance, but rather his appraisal skills and gave him a job in the city's racketeering circle for thievery. It may not have been the grandiosejob he wanted, but he felt happy that he was needed, and was at least well-known among the city's crooks whenever they had stolen goods to turn in. One day, however, the thieves hideout was raided by the city guard and Dubabob arrested. A mysterious stranger bailed Dubabob out, and instructed him to a guild.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LX22ZYMkEJrqeAQqEVy_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects within range: You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LX3tu9ha2MsXc4xNVa9_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You weave illusion magic into your arrow, causing it to occlude your foe’s vision with shadows. The creature hit by the arrow takes an extra 2d6 psychic damage, and it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be unable to see anything farther than 5 feet away until the start of your next turn.

The psychic damage increases to 4d6 when you reach 18th level in this class.
